Package org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.human

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HumanBreakBlockEvent
    Called when a Human breaks a Location.
    HumanChangeBlockEvent
    Called when a Human changes a Location.
    HumanChangeGameModeEvent
    Called when a Human changes GameMode.
    HumanChangeHealthEvent
    Called when the health of an Human changes.
    HumanDeathEvent
    Called when an Human is killed or removed due to unload.
    HumanDropItemEvent
    Called when a Human drops an item(s).
    HumanEnterBedEvent
    Called when a Human enters a bed to sleep in.
    HumanEquipmentChangeEvent
    Called when an entity changes an equipped item.
    HumanEvent
    Describes events which contain a Human.
    HumanExpChangeEvent
    Called when a human gains or looses experience.
    HumanHarvestBlockEvent
    Called when a Human harvests a Location.
    HumanInteractBlockEvent
    Called when a Human interacts with a Location.
    HumanInteractEntityEvent
    Called when a Human interacts with an Entity.
    HumanInteractEvent
    Called when a Human interacts with the world.
    HumanItemConsumeEvent
    Called when an entity consumes an itemstack for any reason.
    HumanLeaveBedEvent
    Called when a Human leaves a bed.
    HumanLevelChangeEvent
    Called when a human's level is changed.
    HumanMoveEvent
    Called when a Human moves.
    HumanPickUpItemEvent
    An event where a human is picking up an item.
    HumanPlaceBlockEvent
    Called when a Human places a Location.
    HumanSleepEvent
    Called when a Human interacts with a bed.
    HumanUpdateEvent
    Called when a Human is updated.
